pages.text: $(o)"Of course, one day, humans, among others, evolved. Being one of the first to think about gods, things changed pretty quickly. They would start shaping nature on their own, they would start producing their own life, indirectly. And then, eventually, one rose even higher."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with the $(l:shaping/entry_key)Winged Key$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)When active, this statue will provide regeneration to every player nearby, and will also increase Magan regeneration slightly.
